attributes.action: provide alternate religion-orientated Bank Holidays to the Christian festivals of Christmas, Easter and Whitsun in order to enable adherents of other religions (such as Moslems, Hindus, Seiks and Buddhists) to have the right to celebrate their major festivals without encountering difficulties in getting time off from work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Cyprus there are a number of religious sects (Armenians, Orthodox Christians, Catholics and Moslems) whose adherents are entitled to elect to take alternate religious Bank Holidays from a published government-scheduled list of major festivals with which their religion or sect are associated. It works very well - and is much better than putting the dampers on Christian festivals for the sake of misguided political attempts to modify the indigenous culture of Britain.
